synopsis.text: Remaining steadfast in the face of adversity, young Marco embarks on a daring transcontinental journey to reunite with his beloved mother in 19th century Italy. As economic hardship and heavy taxes grip their hometown of Genoa, Marco's mother, Anna, is compelled to seek work in far-off Argentina. When her letters abruptly cease, Marco's longing for her becomes unbearable. With unwavering courage and a heart full of love, Marco embarks on a grueling 10,000-mile expedition across the Atlantic and the Andes. Along his transformative journey, Marco encounters both benevolent souls who aid him and selfish adults who attempt to exploit his vulnerability. As he navigates treacherous storms and moral complexities, Marco's unwavering determination to find his mother propels him toward maturity in this captivating tale of adventure and self-discovery.
